short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect, and fight for Sean. Sean makes a fun leader.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sean's game features many levels where you protect Sean from enemies, train, earn bling. You can buy upgrades to enhance your experience, such as increasing Sean's bullet speed, contracting Sean to work for you. There is a very engaging multiplayer mode too where you can fight the boss. 
Sean will be forever indebted to you if you play ðŸ’–
